Oblitertron:



Oblitertron roared in annoyance.  Raising his left hand, he fired an optic 
blast off at the in flight Prowl, a missile firing off at Prowl from the 
middle of Oblitertron's palm.  "NO ONE ESCAPES OBLITERATION!"
